name: Don't Stop in Deep Space
description:
Don't Stop in Deep Space Role: Level Designer (using .json files), Programmer, UI Designer Engine: Unity 2D Controls:

Mouse drag for moving and changing directions

Press Space for shooting

Press C for changing weapons

Don't Stop in Deep Space is a 2D shooter action game in which players need to control a spaceship to shoot enemies in deep space and avoid being destroyed. Wormhole to the next level will be active when all enemies in this level are destroyed, and players will lose once their momentum falls to 0.

There are 4 levels in total, each has different shapes and enemy distributions, therefore using suitable weapons in certain circumstances will be significantly important for players. The last level is a boss level in which players need to fight against a giant spaceship 100 times the size of their spaceship, which represents our understanding of the space and universe.
